creator: Bimser Çözüm
descriptionHtml:
Powerful and Flexible Integration Capability

Strong integration with existing operational systems
Easy and fast integration with popular ERP systems like SAP, AXAPTA, Oracle, Netsis, Logo, Nebim, Micro
Integration with corporate portals via web services
Strong WebPart integration with Sharepoint portal
Integration of business processes other than ERP systems into the ERP system
Management of business processes on paper in electronic environment
Preventing erroneous data entry by talking to existing operational systems in electronic environment





Workflow Management System

Automation of business processes in an electronic environment
Quick and easy integration with enterprise applications
Reduced process costs
Process-oriented business conception
Standardization of business processes
Traceability in business processes
Drag and drop technology
Minimum code spelling requirement
Role-based workflows




Document Management System

Organization of corporate memory
Secure access
versioning
Systematic storage
Quick access with Profile Forms
Controlled access with Check-In / Check-Out
Localization support





Electronic Document Management System

Compliance with TS13298 standard
Compliant with regulations on procedures and principles to be applied in official correspondence
Standard file plan compatible
Qualified electronic signature
Document management
DTVT compliant
e-Correspondence package
Correspondence via PEP




Switching to electronic mediation with eBA Capture

Quickly transfer your documents to electronic media
Easily classify your documents
Transfer to document management and all other operational systems
Increases the efficiency of the archiving team, measures its performance
Prevent non-standard scanning and document formation
Integration with scanners
Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
Improvement and indexing with eBA Capture

Image enhancement features
Black / White, color, gray scan and cycle
Blank page extraction
Orientation and curvature correction
Pollution elimination
Resolution and size correction
indexing
Industry standard image formats such as Tiff, PDF, PDF / A BMP, JPEG, JPEG2000
Importing index information as XML Metadata
Transferable as searchable PDF, Word, Excel with OCR support





Visual reporting support with eBA Dashboard

Organization of corporate memory
Secure access
versioning
Systematic storage
Quick access with Profile Forms
Controlled access with Check-In / Check-Out
Localization support

creator: Bimser Çözüm
descriptionHtml:
Powerful and Flexible Integration Capability

Strong integration with existing operational systems
Easy and fast integration with popular ERP systems like SAP, AXAPTA, Oracle, Netsis, Logo, Nebim, Micro
Integration with corporate portals via web services
Strong WebPart integration with Sharepoint portal
Integration of business processes other than ERP systems into the ERP system
Management of business processes on paper in electronic environment
Preventing erroneous data entry by talking to existing operational systems in electronic environment





Workflow Management System

Automation of business processes in an electronic environment
Quick and easy integration with enterprise applications
Reduced process costs
Process-oriented business conception
Standardization of business processes
Traceability in business processes
Drag and drop technology
Minimum code spelling requirement
Role-based workflows




Document Management System

Organization of corporate memory
Secure access
versioning
Systematic storage
Quick access with Profile Forms
Controlled access with Check-In / Check-Out
Localization support





Electronic Document Management System

Compliance with TS13298 standard
Compliant with regulations on procedures and principles to be applied in official correspondence
Standard file plan compatible
Qualified electronic signature
Document management
DTVT compliant
e-Correspondence package
Correspondence via PEP




Switching to electronic mediation with eBA Capture

Quickly transfer your documents to electronic media
Easily classify your documents
Transfer to document management and all other operational systems
Increases the efficiency of the archiving team, measures its performance
Prevent non-standard scanning and document formation
Integration with scanners
Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
Improvement and indexing with eBA Capture

Image enhancement features
Black / White, color, gray scan and cycle
Blank page extraction
Orientation and curvature correction
Pollution elimination
Resolution and size correction
indexing
Industry standard image formats such as Tiff, PDF, PDF / A BMP, JPEG, JPEG2000
Importing index information as XML Metadata
Transferable as searchable PDF, Word, Excel with OCR support





Visual reporting support with eBA Dashboard

Organization of corporate memory
Secure access
versioning
Systematic storage
Quick access with Profile Forms
Controlled access with Check-In / Check-Out
Localization support
